review: The Fire TV Stick is way faster than my Roku HD. The UI and the remote itself are very responsive, though I liked the Roku's UI a little better. The included remote does not support voice search, but you can add voice search by buying the fancier remote or installing the Fire TV app on your smartphone or tablet.Usually we watch Amazon Prime on our projector via our smart Blu-Ray player, but when I'm watching something alone or for those rare occasions when we don't want to watch something on the projector, I'll sometimes turn on the TV instead. My favorite feature is that it automatically turns the TV on and switches it to the correct HDMI input through my Toshiba TV's "Regza-Link" feature. I assume it's a standard feature with different names on different brands of TVs, but none of our other HDMI devices have done that in the past.
